text: Leaded glass may refer to: *Lead glass, potassium silicate glass which has been impregnated with a small amount of lead oxide in its fabrication * Lead came glasswork, glass panels made by combining multiple small pieces of glass, which may be stained, textured or beveled, with cames or copper foil *Flint glass, an optical glass that has relatively high refractive index and low Abbe number * Leadlight or leaded lights, decorative windows made of small sections of glass supported in lead cames Category:Glass compositions
title: Leaded glass
